name: WW1 ; Lined Bullet - Samuel P.
description: First battle of the Marne ; (( Lined Bullet )) - Start of the game: You’ll start with waking up in the middle of a battle, unsure of what’s going on. You’ll hear gunshots, right beside a trench, unsure what’s going on. - Middle of the game: You’ll go into first person for a second, with a rifle. You’ll have it equipped and have to shoot out some of the enemies. - End of the game: You’ll drop the rifle, you’ve won the battle. You’ve now gone back and have to return. Once you’ve returned, you’ll walk back and you’ll be greeted with, “Game over..” Made using Clickteam Fusion.
